system.note: -20 Toughness or vomit for 1d5 rounds. +20 if respirators/sealed armour. Even if pass, -10 to all Tests from watering eyes. No effect on orks or creatures with no sense of smell. For Orks, Common.

Special: Smoke, Blast (10)
